# Section 2: Absentee / Vote by Mail

## Q2.1: How many contests did you vote in on your 2020 ballot?

```{r}

Q2.1_data <- df %>%
  drop_na(Q2.1) %>% 
  group_by(Q2.1) %>% 
  tally() %>% 
  mutate(percent = n/sum(n)) %>%
  rename(response = Q2.1) %>% 
  mutate(response = as_factor(response)) %>% 
  mutate(response = fct_relevel(response, "All of the contests", "Nearly all of the contests", "Most of the contests", "About half of the contests", "Just a few contests")) %>% 
  mutate(id = as.numeric(response)) %>%
  select(id, everything())

freq_table(Q2.1_data)

```

## Q2.2: Why did you request an absentee ballot? Please select all that apply.

```{r}

Q2.2_data <- df %>%
  filter(if_any(Q2.2_absent:Q2.2_other, ~ !is.na(.x))) %>% 
  pivot_longer(Q2.2_absent:Q2.2_other, names_to = "response") %>%
  drop_na(value) %>% 
  group_by(response) %>% 
  tally() %>% 
  mutate(percent = n/sum(n))

freq_table_unsorted(Q2.2_data)

```
